summary:
Angels are spiritual beings, often shown as beautiful humans with wings and halos. They act as messengers between God and people in many religions. Some famous angels include Gabriel and Michael. In art, they are usually kind and protective, but can also be depicted as scary.

In the Bible, angels have different ranks, and some are even considered fallen or bad. The Devil is sometimes linked to these fallen angels. The idea of a guardian angel watching over us is also popular.
title: Angel
